attributes.action: Ban the song " the White Cliffs of Dover"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The song is factually incorrect. There's is no reason for blue birds ever to be flying over the white cliffs of Dover unless they are escapees, or there is serious climate change, as they are not an indigenous species.

Blue tits would be acceptable as a replacement in the song, however there's no reason why they wouldn't be flying over the white cliffs anyway.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
